text: Vătava (; , Hungarian pronunciation: ) is a commune in Mureș County, Transylvania, Romania arranged of three villages: Dumbrava (Marosliget), Râpa de Jos (Alsórépa) and Vătava. ==Twin towns and cities== Vătava was twinned with Laval, France, until 2009. ==References== Category:Communes in Mureș County
title: Vătava
